properties.description: The Chef user (or in the case of unlinked user, the default information about the Chef user from LDAP or AD)

username.description: A unique namespace matching the format [a-z0-9\-_]+

display_name.description: Human-readable name to be rendered into UIs and other human-readable locations

email.description: Valid email address for the new user

first_name.description: The first name of the new user

middle_name.description: The middle name of the new user

last_name.description: The last name of the new user

external_authentication_uid.description: The external authentication UID of the user (their AD or LDAP ID, generally)

recovery_authentication_enabled.description: Whether this user may log in with their password from the system_recovery endpoint when AD is down
